channel.title: Making a server
channel.description:
hello i am making a server based off an sorascape source...allstar? w\e, any ways i would like some one to post a whole tut like how to port forward be able to get on the ip adress like 532.323.345 (example ) and not just 127.0.0.1 .... yes i have hamchi
HELP please! =[)
,pretty much i need a "guide" on how to make a server ;)
